name: iVisions
overview:
iVisions is an innovative, technology-rich company, providing a range of managed services that allows customers to focus on running their business and increasing the bottom line.

Our services are customized to fit every customer based on customer requirement and industry best practices. With a team of proven staffs who are well verse and experience in enterprise solutions (especially the Asia igaming industry), we extend our services and operation to Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Philippines.

By trusting on iVisions, you can also tap into our rich expertise and service delivery framework of project management, implementation methodology, quality assurance and after-sale maintenance management. This outsourced approach, will resulted in technologies edge and at the same times reduce start-up time and costs, as well as avoiding expensive product acquisition costs.

Service Portfolio:-

  • CDN
  • Anti-DDOS Protection
  • Managed Network
  • Managed Backup
  • Managed Security
  • Managed Hosting
  • Managed Storage
  • Managed Database
  • Data Center Implementation
  • Servicedesk & Operations
  • Consultancy
  • Hosting
  • Internet Services (IP Transit, IPLC, Local loop, IP VPN)
